## DateTimePicker interface

Describes datetime picker component used for displaying and selecting value

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateTimePicker<TDate = any, TCssClasses = object> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [scaleDown](./datetime.datetimepicker.scaledown.md) | Observable&lt;TDate&gt; | Occurs when user scales down |
|  [scaleUp](./datetime.datetimepicker.scaleup.md) | Observable&lt;TDate&gt; | Occurs when user scales up |
|  [value](./datetime.datetimepicker.value.md) | [DateTimeValue](./datetime.datetimevalue.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt; \| null | Gets current value of datetime |
|  [valueChange](./datetime.datetimepicker.valuechange.md) | Observable&lt;void&gt; | Occurs when value changes |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [display(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.display.md) | Set displays date to be displayed |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./datetime.datetimepicker.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
|  [setCanGoDown(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setcangodown.md) | Sets indication whether can go down |
|  [setCanGoUp(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setcangoup.md) | Sets indication whether can go up |
|  [setCssClasses(cssClasses)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setcssclasses.md) | Sets css classes for picker, allowing to override defaults |
|  [setMaxValue(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setmaxvalue.md) | Sets maximal possible value for picker, that can be picked |
|  [setMinValue(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setminvalue.md) | Sets minimal possible value for picker, that can be picked |
|  [setValue(value)](./datetime.datetimepicker.setvalue.md) | Sets value of datetime picker |
